name: taypoints
description: Get taypoints by being active in your favorite servers and use them in a fun economy

options.name: balance
options.description: Show the current taypoint balance of a user

options.name: user
options.description: The user to see the balance for, default you

options.name: leaderboard
options.description: Show the current server's taypoints leaderboard

options.name: gift
options.description: Gift some of your taypoints to a friend

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of taypoints you want to give ('all' & 'half' are supported)

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to give the taypoints to

options.name: succession
options.description: Manage your taypoint succession (what happens to your points if you become inactive)
